channel.title: Confused on this
channel.description: So im trying to fix the "read" option on a handwritten book on my 317 pi based server.. How would i go about making that option and having my custom message inside the book? I've tried looking for tuts or snippets but haven't found anything on the subject anything will help thanks

item.title: Confused on this
item.dc:creator: @thereaper93 thereaper93
item.description:
@thereaper93 wrote:

I am a beginning coder and therefore don’t know the code to help you, but i do understand the concept, which could possibly help you be able to find what you are looking for be it on a forum or somewhere in your source already.
For the book idea you have, you would click read. Now in the code it would have something about that option opening an interface, in which you would put the desired text.

I know this isn’t alot to go on and probably deserves a -1, but i hope it helps you in some way, shape, or form.

Read full topic
